titles.title: I will sing unto the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will sing unto the Lord, for He is worthy to be praised.
I will sing unto the Lord, and bless His holy name.
I will sing unto the Lord, for He is worthy to be praised.
I will sing unto the Lord, and bless His holy name.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You are holy, you are righteous,
You are magnificent, You are victorious,
You are mighty, You are omnipotent.
There is none that can compare,
I've come to bless His name.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bless His Name, Bess His Name,
Let everybody come and Bless His ame
